General.Name: NuTech Energy Resources Inc
General.Description: NuTech Energy Resources, Inc. operates in the energy sector in the United States. The company is a natural gas and oil exploration and development company. It focuses on acquiring approximately 1,000 coal bed methane gas wells in the State of Wyoming. The company was formerly known as EcoEmissions Solutions, Inc. and changed its name to NuTech Energy Resources, Inc. in June 2015. NuTech Energy Resources, Inc. is based in Gillette, Wyoming.
General.Address: 201 West Lakeway, Gillette, WY, United States, 82718
